Shambala ma ọ bụ Shambaa bụ asụsụ Bantu nke Tanzania.
Shambaa bụ asụsụ ndị Shambaa na-asụ n'ugwu nke Usambara na Lushoto District nakwa Muheza District, Tanga Region, nke ugwu Tanzania

E nwere ụfọdụ ọdịiche dị n'etiti asụsụ dị ka a na-asụ n'ógbè dị gburugburu Lushoto na mpaghara ndị dị gburugburu Mlalo nakwa Mtae, eleghị anya n'etiti Shambaa nke Ugwu Usambara nke Ọdịda Anyanwụ na Ugwu Usamara nke Ọwụwa Anyanwụ.
A na-ede ụdaume ise dị ka [i, ɛ, a, ɔ, u].
A na-edepụta diacritics n'ime plosives na-enweghị olu dị ka [nke a na-akpọ n'ozuzu].
